definition: Mongolian oak (Quercus dentata)/see also 槲樹|槲树[hu2 shu4]
to send/to mail/to entrust/to depend on/to attach oneself to/to live (in a house)/to lodge/foster (son etc)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student

sentences.english: It has also been used to decorate homes since pre-Christian times.
sentences.chinese: 在基督教之前，人们已经用槲寄生来装饰他们的家居。

sentences.english: Objective To study the improvement effects of Viscum coloratum on growth of photosynthetic bacteria (PSB).
sentences.chinese: 目的考察槲寄生对光合细菌生长的促进作用。

sentences.english: Kissing is a tradition if two people stand under mistletoe hung in a doorway.
sentences.chinese: 接吻是一个传统如果两个人在门口挂下站在槲寄生上。

sentences.english: This paper investigated effects of lowering blood pressure and acute toxicity of Viscum coloratum (Kom. ) Nakai and Eucommia ulmoides Oliv.
sentences.chinese: 研究了槲寄生和杜仲的降血压作用和急性毒性。

sentences.english: A mistletoe in England would be hanging in a doorway in the shape of a ball.
sentences.chinese: 在英格兰圆球状的槲寄生通常会被悬挂在门口。

sentences.english: The mistletoes have two color types of fruits, and no differences in several parameters between them.
sentences.chinese: 槲寄生有两种色型果实，在量度上无明显差异。

sentences.english: The origin of the belief that the mistletoe had magical powers, began in pre-Christian Europe.
sentences.chinese: 槲寄生有神奇的力量起源于基督诞生以前的欧洲。

sentences.english: Another popular evergreen plant is  mistletoe.
sentences.chinese: 另一种受欢迎的常青植物叫槲寄生。
